thread.section_title: Business & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Exelon to Close New Jersey Nuclear Plant Ahead of Schedule

author: Austen Hufford
title: Exelon to Close New Jersey Nuclear Plant Ahead of Schedule

organizations.name: close new jersey nuclear plant ahead of schedule exelon corp.

text:
Exelon Corp. will shut down a New Jersey nuclear power plant in October, a year ahead of schedule as cheaper energy sources continue to challenge the nuclear industry.
Nuclear plants have been hurt in recent years as rising natural-gas supplies have led to low wholesale electricity prices.
Exelon said higher operating costs and low electricity... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
